text: @HillaryClinton @WHO We must @DrTedros @WHO & 🇨🇳 accountable for the pandemic of #wuhanvirus. Are you serious @WHO is helping 🇺🇸? They were still asking the world not to close the border for 🇨🇳 few months ago. R u still going to fund such a corrupted org?
